Uses of Package
xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

Packages that use xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager Provides a decorator container that is able to store records (of type Block ) which are of different size. 
 

Classes in xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager used by xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
AbstractStrategy
          Abstract implementation of a Strategy which is useful for most of the implemented strategies.
BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy
          This class provides a strategy which makes a best fit search inside pages which have the most free space.
BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry
          Information which is stored for each of the last n allocated pages.
HybridAONFStrategy.PageEntry
          Information which is stored for each of the last n allocated pages.
NextFitWithHStrategy
          This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager.
Page
          This class represents a page that can contain multiple records.
RecordManager.PageInformation
          Does not make I/Os!
Strategy
          An interface for the strategies used by the Recordmanager.
TId
          This class is just a simple wrapping of the id Object and a recordNr.
TIdManager
          A class that implements this interface allows to translate/map a special kind of identifier into tupel identifyers.
